outputs.name: geo
outputs.description:
A Honeybee StateGeometry object representing planar geometry that
can be assigned to Radiance states. This can be assigned using the
"HB Dynamic State" component.

inputs.name: _geo
inputs.description: Rhino Brep or Mesh geometry to be converted to StateGeometry.

inputs.name: _name_
inputs.description:
Text to set the name for the StateGeometry and to be incorporated into
unique StateGeometry identifier. If the name is not provided, a random name
will be assigned.

inputs.name: _modifier_
inputs.description:
A Honeybee Radiance Modifier object for the geometry. If None,
it will be the Generic Exterior Shade modifier in the lib. (Default: None).

name: HB Dynamic State Geometry
description:
Create a StateGeometry object that can be assigned to the shades_ of a dynamic
state using the "HB Dynamic State" component.
-
